resources.string:
Mobile App Assignment 1 
 	 Author : Karim A. Khoja 
 	 Started On : September 30, 2014 
 	 Completed On : October 11, 2014 
 	 Course Name : Mobile Application Development 
 
 How to play the game? 
 	 1 Click on a card to flip it 
 	 2 Match two cards of the same type to score points 
 	 3 Whenever you don't make a match you lose one try 
 	 4 Try matching all the cards in the shortest time possible and get to the top of the score board with a high score
